overview: Hysteria Egyptian film produced in 1998 Story, script and dialogue author Mohamed Helmy Hilal and directed by Adel Adib starring Ahmed Zaki and Abla Kamel and participated in the representation Sharif Mounir and drew Imam and Noha Amrozi and Sami Justice. The film tells about Zain, a graduate of the Arab Music Institute, who ended up singing in the subway
title: هيستريا
